amendment.description: To reallocate for Ground-based Midcourse interceptors to homeland defense and combatting terrorism.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3338 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 56. Record Vote Number: 133.

action.text: Amendment SA 3338 proposed by Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S7092-7094; text: CR S7094) To reallocate for Ground-based Midcourse interceptors to homeland defense and combatting terrorism.
